Name: Aqua Boy
About the game: Aqua Boy is in trouble! He's been double-crossed by his monkey companion and left for dead in the heart of a sunken city. Can you help him complete his mission and stop Albert from getting his hands on a terrible treasure? First released for Flash in 2013, Aqua Boy is a mini metroidvania set in a quirky underwater world and packed with secrets, strange characters and lore. The new Steam edition adds a ton of performance improvements, plus: Controller support A new full-screen mode Steam Achievements and Leaderboards Downloadable soundtrack
Meta Title: Aqua Boy: Oct 7, 2021, Duncan Fenn and Full Overview
